title: What are some upbeat polka music? - Quora

response.answer_text: I’m gonna look through my limited Polka music Walter Ostanek Beer Barrel Polka Clarinet Polka Rose of Old Monterey Oktoberfest Polka Julie’s Polka Barbara Polka Helen Polka Heel and Toe Polka Whoop Polka Just Because Polka Wilkonson’s Polka Buffalo Schottische My Favourite Polka Happy Birthday Polka Tick Tock Polka Gaby Haas Edmonton Swagger ABC Ukrainian Polka Musicians Play All Night Old Timers Cactus Bohemian Polka Happy Boys Sweet Little Girl Frankie Yankovic Do I Want You? Do You Ever Miss Me? Let’s Have a Party Shine Little Sunny, Just Shine Thanks For Making Us So Happy Toe Tappin Happy Polka Milwaukee Polka Let’s All Dance the Pittsburgh Polka Just Because Happy Mountaineer Henrietta Polka Cafe Polka No Beer Today Top of the Hill Polka Baby Doll Polka In Heaven There is No Beer Polkatronron The Village Polka Martre Polka Muddy River Polka Flyaway Polka Golden Leaf Polka Cabbage Rolls and Coffee Polka Polka 100 Polka Round the Town Saturday Night Polka Sunday Morning Polka Round Table Polka Down the Road Polka That exhausts my Polka collection As a general rule it seems like anything with Polka in the title is going to be upbeat. Waltzes are slower.
